title: Calculating differences 1 file scanned and stuck at 0%!!!
body:
Hey, the new patch 6.23 is out and when i try to update my client i keep stuck at 1 file scanned and after 2-4 mins i get a message "unspecified error occurred please check the logs for more information"... i tried many ways to try to fix it but nothing happens like re-installing the game few times, repair my files and delete some files from league folder... etc


And nothing happens it keeps stuck at 1 file scanned and 0%... please help!
http://prntscr.com/dajw6e
http://prntscr.com/dajzrz

replies.body:
This is normally caused by League missing specific admin privileges in order to begin scanning your directory for missing or corrupt files, since this is what happens between 0 and 32% during the patching process. I recommend [configuring your system permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) for League in order to resolve this.

Let me know if this helped.
